short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect specific URLs with a password before access.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Worried about someone accessing a website you'd rather keep private? Whether it’s sensitive information or a personal account, those moments can be uncomfortable.  

With PeekProof, you can secure your browsing effortlessly. This Chrome extension lets you password-protect specific websites. Once a website is added to your list, it’s locked until the correct password is entered, ensuring no one can access it without your permission.  

Perfect for shared devices, it keeps your private sites safe and secure. Simply set your password and enjoy peace of mind, knowing your sensitive information stays protected.
